dcterms:description: An annotated dataset of 2,348 teacher utterances labeled for funneling and focusing questions, or neither, created to support computational detection of these question types in classroom discourse.
dcterms:title: Annotated dataset of teacher utterances

dcterms:description: Transcripts of elementary math classroom observations collected by the National Center for Teacher Effectiveness, used for analyzing teacher-student interactions.

dcterms:description: A coding instrument used to assess the mathematical quality of instruction, providing a framework for evaluating teaching practices in mathematics.
dcterms:title: Mathematical Quality of Instruction (MQI) coding instrument

dcterms:description: A toolkit for the analysis of conversations, providing tools for researchers to analyze dialogue and conversational data.
